snippet.title: Hero of Sparta II (iPhone/iPod touch): Full Opening Trailer - 1st In-Game Images!
snippet.description:
Open your eyes and discover the full cinematic trailer and 1st in-game images of Hero of Sparta II, the mythic Spartan saga returning SOON ON YOUR iPHONE & iPOD TOUCH.

Stay tuned to our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/gameloft) or Twitter account (http://twitter.com/gameloft) to know what Gameloft still has in store for you to celebrate its 10th Anniversary!

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
